ns2:data.ns2:text: Ibn Ḥijjah al-Ḥamawī, Taqī al-Dīn Abū Bakr ibn ʻAlī d. 1434.
Ḥamadhānī, Aḥmad ibn al-Ḥusayn Badīʻ al-Zamān
Sharikat Maktabat wa-Maṭbaʻat Musṭafá al-Bābī al-Ḥalabī

ns2:work.ns2:title: Kashf al-maʻānī wa-al-bayān ʻan Rasāʼil Badīʻ al-Zamān
Kitāb Radd al-sahm ʻan al-taṣwīb wa-ibʻādihi ʻan marmā al-ṣawāb bi-al-taqrīb.
al-Wasāʼil al-adabīyah fī al-rasāʼil al-Aḥdabīyah bi-al-tamām wa-al-kamāl.
كشف المعانى و البيان عن رسائل بديع الزمان
